user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot displays an Amazon product page for the "Razer Nari Essential Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headset." It highlights key features such as THX Spatial Audio, auto-adjusting headband and swivel cups, and a flip mic, compatible with PC, PS4, and PS5. The price shows a 50% discount, bringing the price to $49.99 from the original $99.99. The page also includes a high rating (4,520 reviews) and an option to visit the Razer store.
